    static boolean
    ENABLE_LCP_ITERATIONS_MULTITHREADING
    Due to too many small tasks created for LCP iterations, the overhead involved in submitting a single task to the scheduler and context switching it turns out to be much more efficient to run the iterations as a simple loop rather than related tasks executed concurrently.

  • Field Details

    • REUSE_OBJECTS

      public static boolean REUSE_OBJECTS
      Experimental improvement to reduce GC, see issue #36

    • ENABLE_LCP_ITERATIONS_MULTITHREADING

      public static boolean ENABLE_LCP_ITERATIONS_MULTITHREADING
      Due to too many small tasks created for LCP iterations, the overhead involved in submitting a single task to the scheduler and context switching it turns out to be much more efficient to run the iterations as a simple loop rather than related tasks executed concurrently.
